summary: During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.
cast: John Wayne|Patricia Neal|Ward Bond|Scott Forbes|Philip Carey|Paul Picerni|William Campbell|Kathryn Givney|Martin Milner|Cliff Clark|Jack Pennick|Virginia Brissac|Vincent Fotre|Lewis Martin|Sam Edwards|Louis Mosconi|John Baer|Robert Carson|Gail Davis|Christian Drake|James Flavin|Bess Flowers|Ray Hyke|Gayle Kellogg|Al Kikume|Brett King|Mike Lally|Keith Larsen|Harry Lauter|Richard Loo|Lou Marcelle|Robert Nash|Carl Saxe|William Self|Michael St. Angel|Bert Stevens|Milburn Stone|Harlan Warde|Steve Wayne|Mack Williams|Carleton Young
title: La flota silenciosa
